name: PeopleSoft: Naming convention prefix on Component
associatedValueName: Prefix' for non-Run Control components or 'Run Control' for Run Control components
description: The naming convention check is designed to identify the prefix and suffix corresponding to the type (or subtype) and to the module
output: This report lists all the Component not following the prefix naming convention.
rationale:
The naming convention is mandatory in PeopleSoft to easily identify the added custom objects.
-Upgrade: allow to identify impacts on external objects
-Maintain: the search is used to find the potential objects
remediation: Rename the object using the good naming convention and research all the references to this object using the old reference (function find reference and find in in the application designer)
